long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSS Scan Plus: Redefine Your CSS Workflow  

Transform how you inspect and extract CSS with CSS Scan Plus—the ultimate browser extension for developers and designers, tailored to boost productivity and creativity.  

Try Before You Buy  
Enjoy 10 free scans to experience the power of CSS Scan Plus. After your 3rd scan, a license purchase is required for continued use. With a one-time payment and no subscription, you buy once and enjoy lifetime access.

Key Features 
- View and Edit Instantly: Display CSS in an editable, colorful popup for real-time modifications.  
- Extract CSS Effortlessly: Copy pseudo-classes, animations, media queries, and more with a single click.  
- Batch Processing: Extract and organize styles from multiple elements simultaneously.  
- Flexible Format Conversion: Transform CSS into SCSS, LESS, CSS-in-JS, Tailwind CSS, and more.  
- Advanced Analysis Tools: Access specificity calculators, performance insights, and accessibility checks.  
- Seamless Integration: Export styles directly to CodePen, Figma, GitHub, and other platforms.  

Why Choose CSS Scan Plus?  
- Intuitive Interface: Designed for quick and efficient CSS inspection and extraction.  
- Powerful Features: Includes measurement overlays, grid and flexbox visualizations, and real-time browser compatibility tools.  
- Customizable Experience: Offers shortcuts, templates, and dark mode for tailored functionality.  
- Cross-Browser Compatibility: Fully operational on Mozilla, Opera, Edge, and Safari-compatible version (v1.10) is launching soon!  
- Expanding Global Reach: The next update introduces support for 10 new languages, including French, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Italian, and Chinese.  
- Continuous Improvement: Monthly updates bring exciting new features and bug fixes.  

Take control of your web design process and achieve a new level of precision and efficiency with CSS Scan Plus.  

Get started today and revolutionize the way you work with CSS!
